Desc.entry: A registered charity which helps people with an incurable illness to stay in their own homes. The trust will endeavour to fund whatever it takes to achieve this aim, for example providing nursing care, sitters, help to run the house, equipment care or complementary therapies. The service is available in the Derbyshire Dales and the North East of Sheffield. Organises numerous fundraising events throughout the year in Sheffield and the Peak District. The Trust hopes to expand their service into other communities as funding allows.
